sentences.english: Article 62 After childbirth, female workers shall be entitled to no less than ninety days of maternity leaves with pay.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二條女職工生育享受不少於九十天的產假。

sentences.english: Section 62. After childbirth, female workers shall be entitled to no less than 90 days of maternity leaves with pay.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二條女職工生育享受不少於九十天的產假。

sentences.english: Article 62. After childbirth, female workers shall be entitled to no less than 90 days of maternity leaves with pay.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二條女職工生育享受不少於九十天的產假。

sentences.english: Working women in China are entitled to a paid maternity leave of 90 days.
sentences.chinese: 女職工可享受產假，爲期90天，工資照付。

sentences.english: Fathers would see paternity pay increased to two weeks’ on full pay.
sentences.chinese: 父親們將能享受更多的產假工資，全薪產假爲兩週。

sentences.english: Fathers would see paternity pay increased to two weeks’ on full pay.
sentences.chinese: 父親們將能享受更多的產假工資，全薪產假爲兩週。

sentences.english: Mothers will get full pay for the first 20 weeks of maternity leave.
sentences.chinese: 在產假的頭20周內母親們將能享受全薪待遇。

sentences.english: I am six weeks into my maternity leave with my second child.
sentences.chinese: 生完第二個孩子後，我休產假已經休六個星期了。

sentences.english: On maternity leave, taking care of Gustave , seven months old, and Ceasar, two years old.
sentences.chinese: 產假期間，照顧七個月大的加斯塔弗和兩歲大的絲撒。

sentences.english: Women workers are entitled to maternity leave with full pay.
sentences.chinese: 女工產假期間工資照發。

sentences.english: Article 62 Female staff and workers shall be entitled to no less than ninety days of maternity leaves for childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 第六十二條女職工生育享受不少於九十天的產假。

sentences.english: Use when you give three months maternity leave to payees.
sentences.chinese: 在給受款人三個月產假時使用。

sentences.english: Women workers giving birth shall enjoy a maternity leave for no less than 90 days.
sentences.chinese: 女職工生育享受不少於九十天的產假。

sentences.english: Now I look at colleagues routinely taking a year's maternity leave and returning part-time.
sentences.chinese: 而現在，同事們通常在休完一年產假後重返兼職。

sentences.english: A new EU directive on maternity leave will come into force next month.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟的一項產假新政策將在下個月生效。

sentences.english: Women workers are entitled to a 90-day maternity leave with pay.
sentences.chinese: 女工有權享受90天產假，工資照領。

definition: labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
